Queries.Query: with a as ( Select ProductLocation.Product,Serial,Product.PRODUCTNAME Description,Product.MODEL Model, Product.PRODUCTTYPE ProductType, DAY(EntryDate) as TrnDay,MONTH(EntryDate) as TrnMonth,YEAR(EntryDate) as TrnYear , ProductLocation.EntryDate from [ProductLocation] LEFT JOIN Product on ProductLocation.Product=Product.PRODUCT where PLine=99 and Location=104 and EntryDate between '@StartDate' and dateadd(d,1,'@EndDate') ), b as ( Select ProductLocation.Product,Serial,Product.PRODUCTNAME Description,Product.MODEL Model, Product.PRODUCTTYPE ProductType, DAY(EntryDate) as TrnDay,MONTH(EntryDate) as TrnMonth,YEAR(EntryDate) as TrnYear , ProductLocation.EntryDate from [ProductLocation] LEFT JOIN Product on ProductLocation.Product=Product.PRODUCT where PLine=99 and Location=105 and EntryDate between '@StartDate' and dateadd(d,1,'@EndDate') ), c as ( select a.*,'Not Scanned into warehouse' Status from a LEFT JOIN b on a.Product=b.Product and a.Serial=b.Serial where b.Product IS NULL ), d as ( select b.*,'Not Scanned out of production' Status from b LEFT JOIN a on b.Product=a.Product and b.Serial=a.Serial where a.Product IS NULL ) select * from c UNION ALL select * from d order by EntryDate DESC
